column2: "Matoi is just ahead. She's standing still, waiting."
"...[Profound Darkness] is the essence of photons itself."
"Even if you defeat it, being made of photons, surrounding particles resonate and rebuild it."
"That is why we must trap her here."
"I have a plan, and preparations are set. I need everyone's cooperation, meaning an all-out mobilization."
"In order for this to work you cannot let Matoi escape. No matter what!"
"Just leave the rest to us, and go on ahead."
"...Six, do you read me? I trust you know what to do."
"I hate to break it to you, Xiao, but a certain two here may need a refresher..."
"Oh!? Who?? Who is it!? Don't be shy, raise your hand high!!"
"Me!"
"What!? Claris Claes, how could you not know? ...Actually...I DON'T EITHER!!"
"...Casra, what're you looking at me for? I got this!"
"Can it, kids. We don't have time for your squabbling!"
"Look, we're all nervous here. Can't you find a more constructive way to let it out?"
"...This is one battle in which we can't afford mistakes. Xiao, once more, if you please."
"Please, everyone at ease. Your mission is to simply maintain a barrier."
"It's the same technique that Sukuna-hime used. We must contain Matoi here."
"Sukuna-hime... that Maiden of Harkotan? How exactly did you acquire the method?"
"What, you thought I'd been twiddling my thumbs until now?"
"Sukuna-hime's Braided Ash Formation was six-sided. We're going to re-create it with your Genesis Weapons."
"You Six will take up formation, and by activating each of your Genesis Weapons, form a containment field."
"It may take your full strength just to confine [Profound Darkness] temporarily, but that should suffice."
"Uh... so you mean... get to my assigned position, and make Clarissa go BOOM! ...Or something like that?"
"That's... pretty close!"
"...Don't sweat the details. I'll be directing as the situation unfolds. Move out!"
"Roger!!"
"Is This Reason"
"7章 あなたがうまれたそのりゆう"
